TDAT: 	public void close() {
		if (recordstore != null){
			String fileName;
			try {
				fileName = recordstore.getName();
				Logger.logInfo(this,"close","Closing Recordstore [" + fileName+"].");
				recordstore.closeRecordStore();
			} catch (RecordStoreNotOpenException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();	
			} catch (RecordStoreException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

COM:closes a record store and logs information about the operation
